beer.beer_description:
This insanely delicious take on Mexican hot chocolate is crafted with cocoa, coffee, pasilla peppers, vanilla, cinnamon and nutmeg. First brewed in 2014 with San Diego homebrewer Chris Banker after his recipe was named the winner of our annual homebrew competition, it quickly became a cross-country sensation as craft beer media and fans cheered for Stone Xocoveza…and clamored for more. We too loved this beer, so of course we caroled ¡Claro que sí!

Now gifted with a new name, Stone Xocoveza for the Holidays & the New Year has joined our eminent lineup of special releases. We’re releasing it just in time for that time of the year when the joyous spirit of giving is in the air and good behavior is generously rewarded.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 25 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more Level 6!

items.badge_description: Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 85 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 18!

items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 10 different beers that been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: Holy flavor. Heavily spiced. Like cinnamon coffee.

items.badge_description: You like it thick and dark. Your beer! What did you think we were talking about? That’s 30 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more to unlock Level 7.

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 15 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 4!

user.bio: Beer drinker. I talk about it and brewing at airport.beer. Sometimes at 365brew.com. Other musings at kraft.im

user.bio:
Life is too short to drink industrial beer!
Fav styles: IPA/APA/DIPA/BIPA/ISA, Stout/Porter/IS/IP. New beers everyday.
